00022 #include "gnilnd.h"
00023 
00024 void
00025 _kgnilnd_debug_msg(kgn_msg_t *msg, struct libcfs_debug_msg_data *msgdata,
00026                    const char *fmt, ...)
00027 {
00028         va_list args;
00029 
00030         va_start(args, fmt);
00031         /* XXX Nic TBD: add handling of gnm_u ? */
00032         libcfs_debug_vmsg2(msgdata, fmt, args,
00033                            " msg@0x%p m/v/ty/ck/pck/pl %08x/%d/%d/%x/%x/%d x%d:%s\n",
00034                            msg, msg->gnm_magic, msg->gnm_version, msg->gnm_type,
00035                            msg->gnm_cksum, msg->gnm_payload_cksum,
00036                            msg->gnm_payload_len, msg->gnm_seq,
00037                            kgnilnd_msgtype2str(msg->gnm_type));
00038         va_end(args);
00039 }
00040 
00041 void
00042 _kgnilnd_debug_conn(kgn_conn_t *conn, struct libcfs_debug_msg_data *msgdata,
00043                     const char *fmt, ...)
00044 {
00045         va_list args;
00046 
00047         va_start(args, fmt);
00048         libcfs_debug_vmsg2(msgdata, fmt, args,
00049                 " conn@0x%p->%s:%s cq %u, to %ds, "
00050                 " RX %d @ %lu/%lus; TX %d @ %lus/%lus; "
00051                 " NOOP %lus/%lu/%lus; sched %lus/%lus/%lus ago \n",
00052                 conn, conn->gnc_peer ? libcfs_nid2str(conn->gnc_peer->gnp_nid) :
00053                 "<?>", kgnilnd_conn_state2str(conn),
00054                 conn->gnc_cqid, conn->gnc_timeout,
00055                 atomic_read(&conn->gnc_rx_seq),
00056                 cfs_duration_sec(jiffies - conn->gnc_last_rx),
00057                 cfs_duration_sec(jiffies - conn->gnc_last_rx_cq),
00058                 atomic_read(&conn->gnc_tx_seq),
00059                 cfs_duration_sec(jiffies - conn->gnc_last_tx),
00060                 cfs_duration_sec(jiffies - conn->gnc_last_tx_cq),
00061                 cfs_duration_sec(jiffies - conn->gnc_last_noop_want),
00062                 cfs_duration_sec(jiffies - conn->gnc_last_noop_sent),
00063                 cfs_duration_sec(jiffies - conn->gnc_last_noop_cq),
00064                 cfs_duration_sec(jiffies - conn->gnc_last_sched_ask),
00065                 cfs_duration_sec(jiffies - conn->gnc_last_sched_do),
00066                 cfs_duration_sec(jiffies - conn->gnc_device->gnd_sched_alive));
00067 
00068 
00069         va_end(args);
00070 }
00071 
00072 void
00073 _kgnilnd_debug_tx(kgn_tx_t *tx, struct libcfs_debug_msg_data *msgdata,
00074                   const char *fmt, ...)
00075 {
00076         kgn_tx_ev_id_t  *id   = &tx->tx_id;
00077         char            *nid = "<?>";
00078         va_list          args;
00079 
00080         if (tx->tx_conn && tx->tx_conn->gnc_peer) {
00081                 nid = libcfs_nid2str(tx->tx_conn->gnc_peer->gnp_nid);
00082         }
00083 
00084         va_start(args, fmt);
00085         libcfs_debug_vmsg2(msgdata, fmt, args,
00086                 " tx@0x%p->%s id "LPX64
00087                 "/%u/%d:%d msg %x/%s/%d x%d q %s@%lds->0x%p f %x re %d\n",
00088                 tx, nid, id->txe_cookie, id->txe_smsg_id, id->txe_cqid,
00089                 id->txe_idx, tx->tx_msg.gnm_type,
00090                 kgnilnd_msgtype2str(tx->tx_msg.gnm_type), tx->tx_buftype,
00091                 tx->tx_msg.gnm_seq,
00092                 kgnilnd_tx_state2str(tx->tx_list_state),
00093                 cfs_duration_sec((long)jiffies - tx->tx_qtime), tx->tx_list_p,
00094                 tx->tx_state, tx->tx_retrans);
00095         va_end(args);
00096 }
00097 
00098 void
00099 _kgnilnd_api_rc_lbug(const char* rcstr, int rc, struct libcfs_debug_msg_data *msgdata,
00100                         const char *fmt, ...)
00101 {
00102         va_list args;
00103 
00104         va_start(args, fmt);
00105         libcfs_debug_vmsg2(msgdata, fmt, args,
00106                            " GNI API violated? Unexpected rc %s(%d)!\n",
00107                            rcstr, rc);
00108         va_end(args);
00109         LBUG();
00110 }
